title: Eisenhower National Historic Site: Professional Development
body: Professional Development        Teacher Workshops Summer Days with Documents: The Eisenhower Era offers three days of teacher workshops: 1) Eisenhower and the World Wars, 2) Eisenhower and Diplomacy, and 3) Eisenhower and Civil Rights in which teachers team with with 20th century history experts to investigate compelling Eisenhower era documents and create reading strategies, document based learning objectives, and assessments for students. All Teacher Workshops   SUMMER INSTITUTE    Summer Days With Documents Learn More
